label: LaboratoryObservationParty
comment: An individual, group, or body having a role in laboratory observations.

datatypeProperties.comment: An alternate identifier issued by a third party for this laboratory observation party.
A third party issued identifier, expressed as text, for this laboratory observation party.

objectProperties.comment: The location at which a particular trade related organization or person may be found or reached.
The person defined as the contact for this laboratory observation party.
The location at which a particular trade related organization or person may be found or reached.
The exchange of thoughts, messages, or information, as universally exchanged by speech, signals, writing, or behaviour between persons and/or organizations.

referencedBy.comment: The laboratory observation party who authorized this sample observation result.
The outsourced laboratory party who performed this sample observation result.
